name: For Want Of - S/T EP
description: For Want Of is a screamo band from Austin Texas playing fast thrashy screamo. For fans of Yaphet Kotto, Ampere, Hot Cross, and Raein. This is their debut 7" release, only 300 records were pressed. The price of the record includes shipping.  (Orders of five or more, or orders from outside the US, contact resuscitaterecords@gmail.com)
